review: A bit slow but overall a great value!!!The ease of set up and clear pictureOvertake any other shortcomings!
author: Allen Lopez

review: Don't know why I waited so long to get it! I don't know what these people with connection issues are talking about. Fire stick works perfectly, even when we were just using our mobile hot spot instead of our high speed internet. I feel confident enough after a week of ownership to dump cable altogether. I really onl watched showtime and HBO anyway, now that the apps are on the stick, I certainly won't need to pay $100+ a month anymore for TV. Thanks Amazon!!
author: Tammy L

review: It is great and we love it...
author: Gerald Buijck

review: Does exactly what I needed and expected it to do. Gets me my apps and links to my home movie collection.
author: Glenn Hanley
